import { Link, Route, Routes } from "react-router-dom" import ComA from "./Pages/ComA" import ComB from "./Pages/ComB" import './MainContext.css' import { createContext, useState } from "react" const obj = { a: ['a', 'b', 'c'], b: ['d', 'e', 'f'] } export const creatingContext = createContext(obj) function MainContext() { const [val, setVal] = useState(obj) const creatingnewValue = (value) => { const clonedData = { ...obj } const aCloned = [...obj.a] aCloned.push(value) clonedData.a = aCloned setVal(clonedData) } return
ABC DEF
} /> } />
} export default MainContext
